text:
Reading through this, thought I'd share. A little bit of history.
<https://www.cs.cmu.edu/~rdriley/487/papers/Thompson_1984_ReflectionsonTrustingTrust.pdf|Reflections on Trusting Trust>

elements.text: Reading through this, thought I'd share. A little bit of history.

text: > Since this is an exercise divorced from reality, the usual vehicle was FORTRAN. Actually, FORTRAN was the language of choice for the same reason that three-legged races are popular.
